biography.bio: Annette Roth is an actress, known for Christine (1963), Jadup und Boel (1980) and Unser kurzes Leben (1981).
biography.name: Annette Roth

biography.bio: Günther Haack was born on February 20, 1929 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor, known for Das hölzerne Kälbchen (1960), Christine (1963) and Vergeßt mir meine Traudel nicht (1957). He died on June 16, 1965 in Halle, German Democratic Republic.
biography.name: Günther Haack

biography.bio: Horst Schulze was born on April 26, 1921 in Dresden, Germany. He is known for his work on Solange Leben in mir ist (1965), Les loups blancs (1969) and Trotz alledem! (1972). He is married to Anneliese Pillatzke. They have two children.
biography.name: Horst Schulze

biography.placeOfBirth: Tilsit, East Prussia, Germany [now Sovetsk, Kaliningrad Oblast, Russia]
biography.bio: Armin Mueller-Stahl was born on December 17, 1930 in Tilsit, East Prussia, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for The Game (1997), Angels & Demons (2009) and Passé virtuel (1999). He has been married to Gabriele Scholz since 1973. They have one child. He was previously married to Monika Gabriel.
biography.name: Armin Mueller-Stahl

biography.placeOfBirth: Reppen, Pomerania, Germany [now Rzepin, Lubuskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Friedo Solter was born on July 24, 1932 in Reppen, Pomerania, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Der Mörder sitzt im Wembley-Stadion (1970), Der Neue - Teil 1 (1963) and Dantons Tod (1977).
biography.name: Friedo Solter

biography.bio: Günter Schubert was born on April 8, 1938 in Weisswasser, Germany. He was an actor, known for Gute Aussichten (1999), Elbflorenz (1994) and Sechse kommen durch die Welt (1972). He was married to Petra Nathan and Jutta Schubert. He died on January 2, 2008 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Günter Schubert

biography.bio: Günter Ott is an actor, known for Der tapfere Schulschwänzer (1967), Christine (1963) and Kein Platz für Gereke (1966).
biography.name: Günter Ott

biography.bio: Ostara Körner was born on December 3, 1926 in Leipzig, Germany. She was an actress, known for Die Millionen des Knut Brümmer (1977), Die Spaghettibande (1982) and Solo für Martina (1980). She died on November 30, 2011 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Ostara Körner

biography.bio: Albert Garbe was born on May 25, 1904 in Leipzig, Germany. He was an actor, known for Der Raub der Sabinerinnen (1957), Altweibersommer (1962) and Wer seine Frau lieb hat (1955). He was married to Ilse Kuklinski. He died on March 1, 1975 in East Berlin, East Germany.
biography.name: Albert Garbe

biography.bio: Hans Hardt-Hardtloff was born on August 8, 1906 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He was an actor, known for Karla (1965), Just Don't Think I'll Cry (1965) and The Sons of Great Bear (1966). He died on May 24, 1974 in Potsdam, German Democratic Republic.
biography.name: Hans Hardt-Hardtloff

biography.bio: Johanna Clas was born on September 29, 1931 in Erfurt, Germany. She was an actress and director, known for Bear Ye One Another's Burden (1988), Steine im Weg (1960) and Sabine Kleist, 7 ans (1982). She died on October 21, 2009 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Johanna Clas

biography.bio: William Adelt is an actor, known for Verwirrung der Liebe (1959), Christine (1963) and Als Martin vierzehn war (1964).
biography.name: William Adelt

biography.bio: Günther Ballier was born on October 18, 1900 in Berlin, Germany as Günther Anton Albert Gustav Ballier. He was an actor, known for Two Merry Adventurers (1937), Lärm um Weidemann (1935) and Pipin, der Kurze (1934). He died on April 20, 1980 in East Berlin, East Germany.
biography.name: Günther Ballier

biography.bio: Trude Bechmann was born on January 3, 1904 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary as Gertrud Karafiat. She was an actress, known for Märkische Forschungen (1982), Johannes Kepler (1974) and Mir san mir (1965). She died on July 25, 1982 in East Berlin, East Germany.
biography.name: Trude Bechmann

biography.bio: Bruno Carstens was born on October 26, 1918 in Wilhelmshaven, Germany. He was an actor and assistant director, known for Blaulicht (1959), Optimistische Tragödie (1971) and Nicht verzagen, Trudchen fragen (1980). He was married to Isot Kilian. He died on October 30, 2001 in Saalfeld, Thuringia, Germany.
biography.name: Bruno Carstens
